name: SCORCH (itch) (AccidentallyGames)
description:
*WARNING* Epilepsy and eye strain warning. If you have issues with bright contrasts or flashing lights, please be wary of playing SCORCH.

SCORCH is a first person shooter where the player moves through a completely black and white environment, themed around the 1950s united states and drawing inspiration from the Noir genre of cinema. The game is being developed this semester as a single player experience where players will play through a narrative that is being developed and written further out.

Objective: Make it to the end of the level. 

Bonus objectives: Defeat all enemies; and Don't take damage.

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Interact (Flashlight) - F

Reload - R

Shoot - Left Click

Once you've played, please leave feedback in the questionnaire provided!

If you're not a part of it, come join our discord! https://discord.gg/sbh3K4eTqh

If you have any questions/ other feedback, please email us at AccidentallyGames@gmail.com

Download Instructions:

Click 'Download' below.

Extract all, and put into a folder that's easy to access.

Click open the folder, and run 'Scorch' Unity.
